title: Cosplay info for NA LCS Summer Finals

replies.body: This is super helpful! Thank you, doll! <3

Do you know if the storage room will be secure, or have a coat check type system? I'm using a small suitcase to transport my ahri tails, but I don't want anyone to take my suitcase or anything if it's being unattended or else I won't have a way to transport it back >.< I'm traveling by the subway to MSG btw!

Thanks for asking! The room wont have a coat check system, but security will be posted there while the venue is open. =) There's always a potential risk when leaving belongings alone, though I've never encountered such issues in past cosplay rooms.

Looking forward to seeing your Ahri cosplay!
Okay, thank you! :D Do you also have an approximate time estimate to when the event is about to end for Sunday?
My friend wants to cosplay as gragas, but many of the skins have him with no shirt. Is it ok for guys to wear no shirts for cosplays?
Hey StrongBadEmail! Yes, your friend can remove his shirt if he's cosplaying as {{champion:79}}. As long as it's obviously part of the costume, it shouldn't be an issue. =) Thanks!
